content:
To create a game like Star Wars Battlefront 3, you will need to task out several key components to your team. Here are some of the main components:

1. Game design: You will need a team of game designers who will be responsible for defining the game mechanics, rules, and objectives. They will also be responsible for creating the game's overall design and story.
2. 3D modeling and animation: You will need a team of 3D modelers and animators who will create the game's characters, vehicles, and environments. They will also create animations for the characters and vehicles.
3. Programming: You will need a team of programmers who will be responsible for creating the game's code and implementing the game mechanics. They will also ensure that the game runs smoothly and is free of bugs.
4. Sound design: You will need a team of sound designers who will create the game's sound effects and music. They will also ensure that the game's audio is synchronized with the gameplay.
5. Quality assurance: You will need a team of quality assurance testers who will test the game to identify and report any bugs or issues. They will also provide feedback on gameplay and suggest improvements.
6. User interface: You will need a team of user interface designers who will create the game's menus, HUD, and other graphical elements. They will ensure that the game's interface is intuitive and easy to use.
7. Marketing and distribution: You will need a team of marketers who will be responsible for promoting the game and creating a distribution plan. They will also work with publishers and distributors to ensure that the game reaches a wide audience.

These are just some of the main components that you will need to task out to your team when creating a game like Star Wars Battlefront 3. Depending on the scope and complexity of your game, you may require additional specialized roles such as AI programming, network programming, and level design.
